title: Elections in Sint Maarten
text: <a href="Sint%20Maarten">Sint Maarten</a> elects a <a href="legislature">legislature</a> called the <a href="Estates%20of%20Sint%20Maarten">Estates of Sint Maarten</a>. As the country has no <a href="devolved%20government">devolved government</a>, this is the only chosen representation of the island. It consists of 15 members, elected for a four-year term by <a href="proportional%20representation">proportional representation</a>. The first estates were elected in 2010 as the <a href="island%20council%20%28Netherlands%20Antilles%29">island council</a> of the island area Sint Maarten as the elections took place before the <a href="dissolution%20of%20the%20Netherlands%20Antilles">dissolution of the Netherlands Antilles</a>.
